message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_DATE_PASSED
message.locale: The to date of the primary bank account has passed

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_TYPECODE_JOINT
message.locale: You cannot change a joint account type.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_CANCEL_FAILURE
message.locale: You cannot delete the primary bank account. Please create another bank account and assign it as the primary bank account before attempting to delete this bank account.

message.name: ERR_NOMINEE_XRV_CANCEL_FAILURE
message.locale: This account number cannot be canceled as the nominee of a product delivery uses this account.
This account number cannot be cancelled as the nominee of a product delivery uses this account.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_ACCEXISTS_ALREADY
message.locale: A bank account already exists for this client with this account number at the selected bank.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_JOINTACC_NAME_DIFFERENT
message.locale: Bank account name of the shared account does not match the bank account name entered.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_ACTIVE_ON_CASE
message.locale: The Bank Account is either in active use on a Case or has been used in the past for case payments, therefore it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New bank account details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Bank account details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: INF_SET_BANKACCOUNT_AS_PRIMARY
message.locale: The bank account %1s is set as primary for %2s.

message.name: INF_NO_PRIMARY_BANKACCOUNT
message.locale: There is currently no primary bank account for %1s. Please set a bank account as primary.
